p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Northwest Academy, Home of the Sharks!
Now Enrolling Grades K-8 in Cleveland, Ohio
Northwest Academy is accredited and the recipient of numerous awards from the Ohio Department of Education
Northwest Academy also offers FREE Breakfast, Lunch, and Bus Transportation

div.h1: Welcome To Hope Academy – Northwest Campus
div.p: Also known as Northwest Academy, we are one of the top-performing elementary schools in Cleveland. We offer continuous education through middle school and are open to all K-8 students. We offer an award-winning academic program led by a 100% Highly Qualified Teacher-identified instructional team. We are known for values such as Respect, Pride, and Cooperation. Our students have the opportunity to pursue musical studies and enrichment in Band, Choir, and Symphonic Band.

h2.a: Last Day of School for Students – End of 4th Quarter

div.p: Now Enrolling for the 2020-21 School Year!

img.span: Momentum Award Winner 2016-2019 Presented by the Ohio State Board of Education for exceeding expectations in student academic growth for the past four school years.
A-Rated for Progress Students learn more per school year than at most Ohio schools.
A-Rated for Overall Value-Added Student academic progress in Math, ELA & Science is well-above the state average.

All Teachers Properly Certified & Licensed All teachers meet the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) requirements: Bachelor’s degree, grade-level teaching license/certificate & ability to demonstrate subject area expertise.
100% TGRG Pass Rate All 3rd Graders met Ohio’s Third Grade Reading Guarantee requirements for promotion to 4th Grade.
Accredited by Cognia™ For meeting the highest standards of education in ongoing third-party review.

div.span:
Thank you for choosing Northwest Academy
for your child and allowing us to serve your family.
To begin the enrollment process, please click below.
